meanings.definition: The quality or state of not causing harm or damage.
meanings.sent1: Her nondestructiveness towards the fragile items impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The nondestructiveness of the new technology ensured the safety of the environment.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's power was his nondestructiveness, always saving the day without causing any harm.
meanings.sent4: The nondestructiveness of the peaceful protest made a powerful statement against violence.
meanings.sent5: The nondestructiveness of the medicine on the delicate skin was remarkable.

meanings.definition: The act of preserving or protecting without causing destruction.
meanings.sent1: The nondestructiveness of the historical site was crucial for its preservation.
meanings.sent2: We must appreciate the nondestructiveness of nature in maintaining balance.
meanings.sent3: The nondestructiveness of the bubble wrap made it the perfect choice for packaging fragile items.
meanings.sent4: The nondestructiveness of the shield saved the city from the enemy's attack.
meanings.sent5: The nondestructiveness of the barrier prevented any harm from reaching the garden.
